pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.11: “Ridge beam” renders _piṭṭhivaṁsa_. Sp 2.280: _Piṭṭhivaṁsaṁ atikkamitvāti iminā majjhātikkamaṁ dasseti_; “_Piṭṭhivaṁsaṁ atikkamitvā_: by this going beyond the middle is shown.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.1: “Bedroom” renders _sayanighara_, literally, “house for sleeping”. Kkh-pṭ: _Sayanigharanti sayanīyagharaṁ, vāsagehanti attho_, “Bedroom: a house to be slept in. The meaning is a house for living in.”
